Text: a quick overview tells me that you have quite a good taste indeed, although I am missing some bands. will not down, since I already have most good songs in the list anyway... but tnx for the upload, it could be a great help for those about to rock and don't know where to start ^^

You really shouldn't use such absolutes as "best" and "ever".
One White Zombie song?  One Iced Earth song?  Two Van Halen songs?  No Yngwie Malmsteen, Helmet, Bruce Dickinson, Six Feet Under, or Steve Vai?
No Testament or Type O Negative?!  Go educate yourself about some of the best stuff ever to be recorded in the "metal" genre.  This torrent is shameful.
Torrent name should be Best Metal/Rock Songs that were played to death on MTV Ever!
thank you, really great but you should check for copies of the same song. otherwise good job
